Is there a way to "enumerate" `mapslices` other than
```i = 0
result = mapslices(myarray; dims=dims) do x
    i += 1
    myfunction(x, i)
end```
?

you could enumerate `eachslice` and pass it into a `map`?

```result = map(enumerate(eachslice(myarray, dims=dims))) do (i, x)
    myfunction(x, i)
end```
